pkgmetadata.longdescription: core_module_periodic_table_app==============================Periodic Table module for the parser core project.Quick start===========1. Add "core_module_periodic_table_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting----------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_module_periodic_table_app', ]2. Include the core_module_periodic_table_app URLconf in your project urls.py-----------------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^', include('core_module_periodic_table_app.urls')),
